slides.title: How Vertex AI can help with ISCP/demand planning
slides.content: Vertex AI can help with ISCP/demand planning by providing a platform for data preparation, model development, and model deployment. Vertex AI can also help with ISCP/demand planning by providing a variety of pre-trained models and by making it easy to integrate with other systems.

slides.title: How to accelerate adoption of Vertex AI
slides.content:
There are a number of ways to accelerate adoption of Vertex AI, including:
        - Providing training and support to customers
        - Making it easy to integrate Vertex AI with other systems
        - Making Vertex AI affordable
        - Making Vertex AI easy to use
